title: China’s Manufacturing Activity Pummeled by Covid Restrictions
sub_head: Data offer early glimpse of the coming economic toll from strict zero-tolerance lockdowns in Shanghai, other cities
body: BEIJING—Readings of Chinese factory and service-sector activity worsened dramatically in April, falling to their lowest levels since the early days of the Covid-19 outbreak, as recent lockdowns in dozens of cities across the country shut factories and pummeled consumer spending.
